name: SynthBoat VR
description:
Interactive synthesizer-boat-experiment. Only tested on Vive.

Inspiration from classic Disney animation "Steamboat Willy" and the best vive app so far: "Soundstage vr".

Operating instructions: 


Made with:

- Unreal Engine 4.16.2 (with new audio engine + synth components)

- VR Essential Kit, by user 'jamis' on Unreal Engine Forums: https://forums.unrealengine.co... (Newer version, not used here: https://forums.unrealengine.co... )

- Low Poly Piano/Keyboard by user 'dpalme' on Sketchfab: https://sketchfab.com/models/9...
